title: They Are My Noble Masters
overview:
Ren and his sister Mihato decide to leave their fathers house and move 
to the city due to family troubles. Both Ren and Mihato try very hard to
 find work, but no work seems forthcoming until they both help a young 
girl by the name of Miyu Kuonji. The Kuonji family is quite rich and 
takes both Ren and Mihato in as servants for them. The only trouble for 
Ren and Mihato being that the Kuonji family is far from normal.
